review: I had a confusion about my leg pain being caused by varicose vein and wanted a clarity. Dr. Manigandan explained the problem, I recommend this doctor

I am very thankful to Dr Manigandan for diagnosing my symptoms and providing me with medication that helped me recover fast.

He was very supportive whenever we reached to him to seek any
clarifications. I can vouch that any patient who approaches him for
consultation is in safe hands. *** ** *** **** *** **** ************ ********** ** **** **********
Thank you once again Dr Manigandan.

I booked an appointment for 1pm I was there in the hospital 10min earlier but the doctor refused to attend, saying he wouldn't take the patient after 1. if he won't take patient after 1 then they should not keep that slot.

I visited trust-in hospital for swallowing pain in throat and sinusitis towards forehead, the prescription given did not work for me, rather the diagnosis may be right, however the doctor listened to problems, I could sense hesitation of the doctor in physical examination, partly due to Covid B7 wave. The follow-up process is not great in Trust-in hospital, to swap a doctor the appointment has to be a new one.

The Dr is excellent ,kind,explains to patients the type of sickness you have .

But the staff is pathetic,
Do not know to pronounce names of the patient.
Opd worse,no proper attender to take care of the patient if the strecher is required,
Or if they have to help to put the patient on the bed.

I think there should be a proper P.R.
In the hospital to handle patients ,with there issues.

Kind and caring doctor with keen insight on diagnostic approach had explained my situation and treatment in a well approached way, above all this he took a personalized concern in my health. Dr. Manigandan is Highly recommended physician to all.
